patthana16.60:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.60:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.60:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.60:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.60:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
